snippet: Policy makers lowered their assessment of the economy and noted that inflation was likely to remain low.
abstract: Stocks rally in wake of Federal Reserve's signal that it might slowly move to raise interest rates.
lead_paragraph: Policy makers lowered their assessment of the economy and noted that inflation was likely to remain low.

headline.main: Market Rallies After Fed Outlines Cautious Approach to Raising Rates
headline.print_headline: Shares Rally on Fed’s Cautious Words
